summary: This is a court order from Judge Lorna G. Schofield in the Southern District of New York, directing the plaintiff to pay Ghislaine Maxwell $102.19 in costs. The order follows Maxwell's notice of taxation of costs and the plaintiff's statement of non-objection.

persons.name: Lorna G. Schofield
persons.context: Issued the court order directing the plaintiff to pay costs to Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Listed as a defendant in the case caption, but not directly mentioned in the order's text.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Filed a notice of taxation of costs and is the recipient of the $102.19 payment ordered by the court.

connections.description: Listed as co-defendants in the same civil case (19 Civ. 10475).
Judge Schofield issued a court order in favor of defendant Maxwell regarding payment of costs.

events.title: Maxwell Files Notice of Taxation of Costs
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell filed a notice and proposed bill seeking taxation of costs totaling $102.19.

events.title: Plaintiff States Non-Objection to Costs
events.description: The plaintiff filed a letter stating she does not object to paying the $102.19 in costs.

events.title: Court Orders Payment of Costs
events.description: Judge Lorna G. Schofield ordered the plaintiff to pay Ghislaine Maxwell $102.19 in costs.

locations: United States District Court Southern District of New York
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell successfully sought and was awarded $102.19 in costs from the plaintiff in civil case 19 Civ. 10475.
The plaintiff did not object to paying the costs, as stated in a letter filed on March 23, 2021.
Judge Lorna G. Schofield issued the order on April 9, 2021, directing the Clerk of Court to tax costs.
Darren K. Indyke is listed as a co-defendant with Ghislaine Maxwell in the case caption.
